DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_GRAPH_SEMAFOROITEM_DESFECHO
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="select
 case
 when DESFECHO = 1 then 'Resolvido'
 when DESFECHO = 2 then 'NÃ£o resolvido'
 ELSE 'Pendente'
 end ROTULO,
 case
 when DESFECHO = 1 then '#26C281'
 when DESFECHO = 2 then '#E35B5A'
 ELSE '#578EBE'
 end COR,
 COUNT(HANDLE) VALOR
from K_CRM_PESSOASEMAFOROITEM
GROUP BY DESFECHO" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="ROTULO" From="A" Path="ROTULO" /> <Field Alias="COR" From="A" Path="COR" /> <Field Alias="VALOR" From="A" Path="VALOR" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
